question:
You are a student at an English language school in Brighton and are living in private accommodation with other flatmates. You have not had hot water or heating for some time. The landlord’s workmen have tried to fix the problem but without success.


 


Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter,


 


state your reason for writing


describe the problems and explain how you feel


propose a solution and risk the landlord to take action
text: I am writing this letter regarding with problems of hot water and heating. The worker came several times and was not able to solve the problems.

We are quite satisfied with the modern decoration and great location of this apartment. However, the hot water from the tap just occasionally drops out when we are taking a shower and the heater does not work many times during cold nights. This abnormal situation has largely affected our daily lives and made us suffer.

As you may know, according to the plate on the boiler, it has been used for more than 10 years. Workmen have tried to repair it several times but failed to make it work properly. This indicates that the boiler is not repairable. We asked the manufacturer and they strongly suggest replacing it with a new one as soon as possible,otherwise there is a risk that water will leak and make further damage to the floor.
Please let me know if you can arrange a new boiler for the apartment and we will spare our time to let any installation be finished.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase otherwise. Consider adding a comma.
